attributes.additional_details:
In her recent writing for the Telegraph (http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/religion/9080441/We-stand-side-by-side-with-the-Pope-in-fighting-for-faith.html), Baroness Warsi has clearly demonstrated that she has become detached from reality. Her central claim of "militant secularisation" clearly shows fear of an enemy which is simply not present.
We the undersigned believe that this inability to see the world as it is makes Baroness Warsi unfit to work in the cabinet.
